premise: A man riding a bike down a hill.
hypothesis: There is a man outside on a hill.
explanation_1: If a man is riding a bike down a hill he is on the hill, and hills are outside.

hypothesis: women are next to each other, sitting
explanation_1: Two women sitting next to each other

premise: Children getting pulled into water pit while playing tug-of-war.
hypothesis: Children are playing a game of tug-of-war.
explanation_1: palying tug-of-war children get pulled i into the water pit.

premise: A man handing a box to a group of men.
hypothesis: Man hands an object to a group of men.
explanation_1: handing a box is inferred as  hands an object

premise: A man looks on in a club.
explanation_1: Looking on in a club does not imply that the man is outside.

premise: Two little girls both dressed in brown and one with a peace sign on her shirt play in a green meadow.
hypothesis: Two little girls are playing in the meadow after getting bored inside the house.
explanation_1: Not all two little girls both dressed in brown and one with a peace sign on her shirt play in a green meadow are getting bored inside the house.

premise: Lots of people are sitting at tables doing something.
explanation_1: The people are not necessarily women.

premise: A man with reflective safety clothes and ear protection drives a John Deere tractor on a road.
hypothesis: A man is driving his John Deere tractor down the road to his farm.
explanation_1: A man driving a John Deere tractor on a road is not necessarily to his farm.

premise: A man in a black suit standing inside of a train.
hypothesis: A man stands outside a train.
explanation_1: A man can either stand inside of a train or outside of a train, not both.

premise: Young boy playing in the water.
hypothesis: Young boy playing in a sandy desert.
explanation_1: Water is not considered to be in a sandy desert.

premise: A woman with her hair up and wearing sunglasses is sitting and leaning against the back of a sofa while looking at her phone.
hypothesis: A woman is sitting on a table.
explanation_1: A woman sitting on a sofa is not sitting on a table.

premise: A group of men of various ages wearing glasses while holding instruments and looking at sheet music.
hypothesis: A group of men are playing basketball.
explanation_1: The group can't be playing basketball while holding instruments.
